name: Tankrovia
detailed_description:
Tankrovia is a Top Down Twin Stick Battle Arena with, you guessed it: Tanks! Play as one of the somewhat unique pilots with unique abilities. Explode your opponents in 2-4 players Free-for-All or Teams matches!
The game is a cool mix of moba and classic tank games.
Straight-forward, chaotic, and explosive; though designed to take advantage of strategy and careful positioning.

Read this short guide to learn the fundamentals of Tankrovia: Community Guide
The game can be played with Mouse+Keyboard, or gamepad. But we highly recommend you play it with gamepads.

Current version is v03:

The game has 6 characters, 6 weapons and 6 arenas.
The game has 2 game modes:
- Single Player PvE Challenges! 10 short missions with 10 more to come!
- PvP Battle Arena! 2-4 players free-for-all or team-games.

Next Versions:

  • v04 will bring a new character, 3 more arenas, 5 new challenges, completely re-worked selection menus (where you move with the pollos), and voice-lines! We deliver a new version around every 6 weeks!
  • v05 will bring a new character, 4 new maps, and we'll make new HUD/UI elements, as the current ones are awful. By v05 the game will have 8 characters, 8 weapons, 12 arenas, and 20 single player missions!

    Beyond that:

    Our main focus after the above is done, is going to be the 1-4 players Coop Campaign, and online play.

short_description: Tankrovia is a Top-Down Twin-Stick Battle Arena. Play as one of the unique Tanks with unique stats and abilities. Play solo missions, or destroy your opponents in explosive Free-for-All or Teams matches!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 x64
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 720 (or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 x64
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 560 (or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
